import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { ModalBuying, ModalSelling } from "../../items"; import "./holdingShares.style.css"; import axios from "axios"; const HoldingShares = ({holding,setHolding}) => { const [buyOpen, setBuyOpen] = useState(false); const [sellOpen, setSellOpen] = useState(false); return ( <> ))}
{holding.map((holding, i)=>(
{holding.stockName} {holding.symbol}
잔고 {holding.shareCount}주 손익 {holding.profitLoss} 원
평가 금액 {holding.evaluatedSum} 원 수익률 {holding.profitRatio} %
매입가 {holding.purchasePrice} 원 현재가 {holding.nowPrice} 원
setBuyOpen(false)} /> setSellOpen(false)} /> ); }; export default HoldingShares;
